Ultimate Startup Championship

THE FUTURE OF TECH EVENTS IS HERE

LEARN MORE

The Ultimate Startup Championship is the World's Biggest Startup Competition with a difference. The best innovators pit against each other in an epic battle to define tomorrow.

How it works

NOMINATIONS

There will be nominations of 4 top startups from each category from each participating country nominated by our country partners.

PRELIMINARY KNOCKOUTS

There are 4 knockout rounds and in each round there will be voting where one startup from each category per country shall be pitted against each other.

BATTLE ROYALE

All the qualified startups pitted against each other, with all the country partners voting. Country Partners having startups from their country in the Final Battle Royale shall not vote in that particular category. The winner will be crowned.

The Ultimate Startup Championship has 11 categories on which startups will compete.

  • Finance
  • Clean Energy
  • Clothing
  • Logistics
  • Management
  • Agriculture
  • Communication
  • Home Automation
  • City
  • Health
  • Learning
1000 + Teams
11 Categories
20 + Countries
